paper_abstract: Based on the neighboring dual nucleotides, we reduce a DNA sequence into a plot set in four-dimensional space, and associate with the eigenvalues of the introduced covariance matrix. The examination of similarities/dissimilarities among the coding sequences of the first exon of beta-globin gene belonging to eleven species illustrates the utility of our approach.
paper_title: Analysis of similarity/dissimilarity of DNA sequences based on dual nucleotides
